textContent:
2 ounces Havana Club 3 Year "clone" (see Editor's Note)
1 ounce lime juice
1/2 ounce maraschino liqueur, preferably Luxardo
2 tablespoons refined sugar
1 1/2 cups crushed ice
Garnish: lime, cherry

Combine all the ingredients in a blender and blend on high speed for 20 seconds.
Pour into a coupe.
Garnish with a lime wheel and a maraschino cherry.

https://punchdrink.com/recipes/floridita-daiquiri-frappe
title: Floridita Daiquiri Frappe
